publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2082.1 Jamie McGrigor: Stamp Duty—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2082) in the name of Christine Grahame, leave out from "on subsequent bands" and insert "welcomes the Conservative’s commitment to abolish stamp duty on homes up to £250,000 which will mean that nine-out-of-10 first-time buyers pay no stamp duty." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-2082.1 Jamie McGrigor: Stamp Duty—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2082) in the name of Christine Grahame, leave out from "on subsequent bands" and insert "welcomes the Conservative’s commitment to abolish stamp duty on homes up to £250,000 which will mean that nine-out-of-10 first-time buyers pay no stamp duty."
S3M-2082.1 Stamp Duty (lodged on 9 June 2008) Ted Brocklebank*
